channel.title: RonKJeffries tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from RonKJeffries.

item.description: @DigestAndroid My S22 is supposed to arrive in early April. I really like size and significantly less weight. Reviewers don't pay attention to how much a phone weighs but like display quality, weight is continually a perceptible factor.
@teamVRY @Mobvoi_Official Have ordered the Galaxy S22, currently a Pixel 4a 5G user. Curious how you would compare To watch 3 with latest Samsung watch.

@CatoMinor3 @logseq @Obsidian @RoamResearch @NotionHQ @ScrapboxApp @davewiner @rem_note @KinopioClub How well does @rem_note work on a phone? I want a mobile friendly system that can easily be used on various systems including Android, ChromeOS, Windows and iPad. @davewiner 's Drummer is designed for desktop use. If the CSS was tweaked it would be useable in portrait mode.

There are many #notetaking aka Tools For Thought #twt apps. Looking for a solid overview of the various approaches. Partial list: @logseq @Obsidian @RoamResearch @NotionHQ @ScrapboxApp ? And maybe? @davewiner 's outline app #drummer Please comment with any I missed. https://t.co/w2a0zy7l6y
@telegram so I guess I may have used a different phone number when setting up the account?
@RonJeffries So you avoid any cryptocurrency, like me...? So much fraud, so much ponzi.
@RonJeffries I am a skeptic but have a little FOMO...
@davewiner My hunch: this is Twitter adding Medium features. Would assume at some extra cost.
@marccanter4real I like how you think!
@Feldenkrais10 @ryannagy @RoamResearch @logseq @obsdmd Hilarious!

Interesting new project from @davewiner -- not sure I fully grasp the potential. If only there was an active, vibrant community organized around his projects, especially including Drummer. https://t.co/XHQh6wPWK9
@csd @FPWellman @TheRickWilson @JDVance1 A badge of honor.
@roscaf @upsfeup @davewiner Amazon is my go to for many types of purchases, mundane stuff so I don't have to go to a store, hardware, computer stuff etc. It's my general store.

Testing my Twitter Thread-Fu. This is tweet #1
This is tweet #2 of a test thread. as a comment. Or should I be retweeting??
Tweet #3 of a test thread, again as a comment.
Tweet #4. I guess this works. ?? just keep commenting?
This really is boring Tweet #5. I guess commenting on latest comment in a thread is correct approach?
@roscaf @upsfeup @davewiner Serious question: what are your alternatives for online shopping?
@AdamJMatlock Say it ain't so. But this one pricing move will improve the health of millions.
@lasersailor @TechnicallyTee @SpigenWorld Getting close. Just today got a sim I can use to port in. Slightly hesitant because Pixel is different experience.
@AdamJMatlock But why? LOL
@TechnicallyTee @SpigenWorld Please cover cases for the S22. I have already ordered one (ESR metal kickstand $18) but will order another in a heartbeat.
@TechnicallyTee Thanks for the data!
@AdamJMatlock @theramalmedia Tradeoff is significantly lower weight. If I need to top off once a day for me it's not a biggie.

@theramalmedia During preorder, Google Fi deal on S22 makes it effectively $500 all in including required four months of service. Pixel 6 is nice (my daily driver is Pixel 4a 5G) but S22 smaller size and significantly lower weight is appealing. 4 years of updates + 5th year security is cool.
